name: Mission X-2
overview: A platforming game published in 64'er Sonderheft 37. The starbank of Astra, the richest deposit of precious gems and metals in the entire galaxy has always been considered an impregnable fortress, thanks to the highly sophisticated electronic alarm systems that control a myriad of unstoppable cyber guards. But for those charged with Mission X-2, the enterprise of robbing the big bank represents a goal and a challenge of great prestige. For this reason he has decided to challenge the impenetrability of the complex. While getting into it was a fairly easy feat, our hero will now have to contend with the infamous robotic hordes. The myriads of traps capable of incinerating anything face the your team. If you are skilled, you will be able to interfere in the control of the guardians from the numerous terminals or receive useful information to open the way to wealth and fame.
